description:
This is not really a bug, but I noticed that nova-api.conf is hardcoded in line 82 of bin/nova-api

It would be nice to have it specified as flag as we still want to have the api's flagfile named nova-api.conf.
title: nova-api.conf hardcoded in bin/nova-api
